system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.x0nG5fvFuZUAMz05]{Evasive Martial Arts}

Benefits

The character gains a +3 bonus on opposed checks any time the character attempts Trip or Grapple attacks, or when the character tries to avoid a Trip or Grapple attack made against him or her.
